programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Abbey freezes her friends in 'So Chill', then in 'Mix Up Meowlody', Meowlody learns to appreciate her strengths. (S2, ep 4)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: The Haunted Sand Castle Caper: The Boo Crew vacations in the Bermuda Triangle. Clawdeen investigates a destroyed sandcastle that could change the fate of the election. (S2, ep 5)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Thundreth: Nearing their 100th save, Phoebe & Max are determined to make it their best one yet. But they overlook a super villain plotting revenge on his old rivals - Hank and Barb. (S4, ep 29)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Looperheroes: The Z-Force gives Max and Phoebe a superhero day off, but when they relive the day over and over again, they must find a way to break the loop. (S4, ep 22)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Part 2 - A New Darkness: After a criminal steals Kid Danger's superpower and learns his identity, goons are sent to Henry's house. Jasper, Charlotte and Schwoz work to get his power back. (S5, ep 7)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Part 3 - A New Hero: Schwoz works to create an anti-virus while Kid Danger and Captain Man battle a villain. Kid Danger's heroism is put to the test as they fight to save the world. (S5, ep 8)

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: The Code: With Oliver's help, Sal builds a phone mast and is finally able to decipher the pyramid. Anika quizzes Dottie about the artifacts in the attic, but has trouble getting answers. (S3, ep 7)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurfette accidentally loses the Smurf Village in 'Wanna Bet?', then in 'Gargamel, Queen of the Prom', the Smurf Girls invite all the Smurfs to their Grand Equinox Ball. (S2, ep 24)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Smurf vs Machine: Jealous of Diaper Daddy, Handy crafts himself a dysfunctional and overpowered exoskeleton. Diaper Daddy is the only one who can save him. (S3, ep 1b)

programme.title: Best & Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester find out what gives their favourite cereal such a purply taste in 'Tenta-Flakes', then in 'Boss Level', Bester's ideas to make mini golf fun nearly lead to disaster. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob works the grill at the toughest joint in town in 'The Salty Sponge', then in 'Karen for Spot', Karen looks after Spot while Plankton goes out of town.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Sandy gives her friends special saltwater trees in 'Arbor Day Disarray', then in 'Ain't That The Tooth', SpongeBob and Patrick mistake a burglar for the tooth fairy.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Little Drummer Boy: When Alvin insists on taking over the drums from Theodore, Theodore fights back by mimicking Alvin and stealing his persona. (S5, ep 18a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin Gets Schooled: When Dave learns Alvin blamed him for his poor grades to Miss Smith, Dave sets down a very strict study schedule. (S5, ep 19a)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: My Life As a Dog: Theodore must pose as a dog after the chipmunks accidently shave the fur off a dog Miss Miller is dog sitting. (S5, ep 19b)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Mr. Lou: Theo's funky art project becomes a star with its own social media fans, which is great until the page is hacked! (S5, ep 20a)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick looking for a lost action figure in 'Swamp Mates', then in 'One Trick Sponge', SpongeBob learns a new magic trick, but he can't find anyone to watch it.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lori and Bobby find a kitten in 'Meet the Purrents', then in 'Apartment Complex', after telling her family how great her apartment is, Lori's sisters secretly take over her space. (S9, ep 3)

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel faces the Wish Trials in 'Department of Magical Violations', then in 'Teacher's Pal', Hazel wishes her teachers were friends. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Parks & T-Rex: Preoccupied with Z-Force training, Phoebe & Max learn that they've forgotten special family events. Wanting to make it up, Phoebe plans a family fun day. (S4, ep 9)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Live & Dangerous, Part 2: When Frankini announces his plan to unmask Kid Danger and Captain Man on his show, Charlotte, Schwoz, Piper, and Jasper snap into action to try to stop him. (S3, ep 20)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Brittany and the girls release a video that Alvin, Simon, and Theodore can't top in 'Viral', and in 'Brothers of Dagarack', Simon asks Alvin and Theodore not to see a new movie without him (S2, ep 20)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin borrows Simon's invisibility suit in 'Overlooked', and in 'Wish Upon a Star', when Theodore makes a wish, the Chipmunks try to learn what it is, so that they can make it come true. (S2, ep 21)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick build a golf course indoors in 'A Friendly Game', and then in 'Sentimental Sponge', SpongeBob has trouble throwing things away due to the memories attached to his possessions.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Frozen Face Off: Bikini Bottom prepares for a sleigh race where the prize is $1 million, but plans change when they discover Plankton's scheme to steal the Krabby Patty formula during the race!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln thinks it's time to help Leni pass her driver's test in 'Driving Miss Hazy', and in 'No Guts No Glori', Lincoln conspires with his sisters to overthrow Lori's tyranny as babysitter. (S1, ep 3)

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln devises a plan to get the best seat in the car in 'The Sweet Spot', and then in 'A Tale of Two Tables', Lincoln tries to prove he's mature enough to have dinner at the adult table. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin suspects his neighbour is responsible for a recent heist in 'What A Gem', and in 'Family Spirit', Alvin tries to get out of the family picnic with Dave to go to a soccer game. (S1, ep 4)

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin catches Simon taking a test to discover his soul-mate in 'Albrittina', then in 'Simon for President', Simon and Alvin decide to launch their own campaigns for class president. (S1, ep 6)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: Who's Your Mommy?: Max and Phoebe accidentally sell one of Barb's superhero utility belts to a superfan at the family's garage sale, and must get it back before she finds out. (S2, ep 13)

programme.title: The Thundermans
programme.desc: The Amazing Rat Race: Max turns Billy into the world's fastest rat. Billy, getting a taste for running at super-speed, decides he does not want to go back to his human self. (S2, ep 14)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry and the Bad Girl, Part 1: A graffiti gang is spray-painting all over Swellview. While trying to track down the leader, Kid Danger is tempted by a cute girl in the gang. (S1, ep 24)

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry and the Bad Girl, Part 2: A graffiti gang is spray-painting all over Swellview. While trying to track down the leader, Kid Danger is tempted by a cute girl in the gang. (S1, ep 25)

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick messes with the space-time continuum in 'The Patterfly Effect', then in 'A Space Affair to Remember', Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space. (S1, ep 18)

programme.title: The Loud House

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae pawb yng Nghoedwig yr Olobob yn gyffrous i glywed Norbet yn dweud jcs yn ei Sioe Ddigri, ond mae'r gynulleidfa yn anodd ei phlesio! Can the Olobobs help Norbet find his funny bone?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gobeithio mai dyma ei flwyddyn i ennill 'Y Ras Fawr'! Digbi hopes that this is his year to win 'The Great Race'! But Glenys tells Teifion that she must win the race.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar l trip i'r sw mae Jamal eisiau gwybod 'Beth oedd yr anifail cyntaf erioed?' Tadcu reels out a silly story about a tortoise by the name of Darwen, the only animal that lived on earth!

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae 'na ben-blwydd arall yn yr harbwr heddiw - pen-blwydd yr harbwr ei hun. There's another birthday celebration at the harbour today - it's the harbour's birthday!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back, with Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn deffro ar fore niwlog a'n meddwl bod Ynys Ddoeth wedi codi i'r cymylau. The Woohoos wake up on a foggy morning and think Wise Island has floated up into the clouds.

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae Sin yn perswadio Mario i roi cynnig ar fersiwn iachus o un o'i hoff fwydydd. Sin persuades Mario to try a healthy version of his favourite dish.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Siarlys a Sam wedi mynd i ffwrdd am benwythnos dawel i Ynys Pontypandy, ond dyw'r profiad ddim mor "dawel" a hynny. Sam and Siarlys go away for a quiet weekend to Pontypandy Island.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae Dela yn cael cymorth ei chwaer fach i ddatrys dirgelwch diflaniad rhyfedd mewn coedwig wymon. Dela teams up with her little sister to solve a mysterious disappearance in a kelp forest.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Daw galwad gan Gareth Potter y DJ a Lloyd - o na! mae eu seinyddion wedi torri. A call comes in from DJ Gareth Potter and Lloyd. Harri's help is needed as Gareth's speakers are broken.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Mae'r Cymylaubychain wedi blino'n ln, tybed pam, a phwy sy'n gyfrifol? Why is everyone so tired today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae rhywun yn dwyn pethau oddi wrth Digbi a'i ffrindiau yn ystod y nos. Someone is taking items from Digbi and his friends in the middle of the night. Who could it be?

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Mae Iola'r ir yn ir swil iawn. A fedr Lleucu Llygoden, gyda chymorth ei chamera newydd, ei helpu? Iola the chicken is very shy. Will Lleucu Mouse be able to help her gain confidence?

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gan Ben air 'abadobidii' arall i'r Abadas heddiw; 'trn stem'. Tybed pwy yw'r Abada gorau i fynd i chwilio amdano? Ben has another great word for the Abadas today; steam train.

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd ar y trn heddiw. Allwch chi gofio swn y trn er mwyn canu gyda nhw ar y daith? Harmoni, Melodi and Bop are riding on a train today.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae Blero'n mynd i Ocido i ddarganfod pam mae ei gysgod yn ei ddilyn i bobman! Blero goes to Ocido to find out why his shadow follows him around!

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Cyfres newydd! Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. A new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Wedi i Jason ddyfeisio Pelydr Gwrth-Ddisgyrchiant ma Jetboi'n benderfynol mai ei declyn personol o fydd hwn. Jason invents an Anti-Gravity Ray and Jet-boy wants to make it his personal tool.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Y Castell sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Y Castell join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Olobobs
programme.desc: Mae'r Olobobs yn clywed cn snwff swynol, ond bob tro maen nhw'n ceisio closio mae'n hedfan i ffwrdd. The Olobobs hear a lovely snoof song, but find it impossible to get near the creature!

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Digbi'n gadael pr o adenydd i hedfan o dy Betsi ar ddamwain. Digbi accidentally lets out a pair of Betsi's wings and decides to get them back before she finds out.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Pwy oedd y person cyntaf ar y lleuad? Cyfle euraidd i Tad-cu ddweud wrtho mai ei fam-gu a'i ffrind Beti oedd y bobl yna! Hari's question today is: who was the first person on the moon?

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae radio'r Harbwr Feistr wedi torri ac yn anffodus, ni all gysgu heb wrando ar swn cerddoriaeth. The Harbour Master's radio has broken and he can't sleep without listening to music.

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn gweld y lleuad yn diflannu'n sydyn ac yn meddwl bod rhywbeth yn ei fwyta! The Woohoos see the moon apparently disappearing and think something is eating it!

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae cawl newydd Sin mor boblogaidd, mae'n rhedeg yn fyr o gynhwysion. Mae Izzy'n achub y dydd gydag awgrym blasus iawn. Izzy improvises when Sin's new soup proves so popular it runs out!

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae Jams, Mandy a Norman gyda'i gilydd ar Arwr y Mynydd gyda Moose. Today, Jams, Mandy and Norman are together on the Mountain Hero with Moose.

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Mae'r Octonots yn brwydro drwy gors i achub fflamingo bach cyn iddo gael ei ddal gan ysglyfaethwyr llwglyd! The Octonauts wade through a swamp to find a lost flamingo chick.

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call from Lisa and her father - their welding machine has broken and Harri goes to help. Mae Harri'n cael galwad gan Lisa a'i thad gan fod y peiriant weldio wedi torri.

programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae'r Tralalas yn mynd i'r ysgol heddiw. Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn gwneud llun gyda phensiliau lliwgar. The Tralalas are going to school today where Harmoni, Melodi & Bop draw a picture.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu
programme.desc: Ar l ymweliad at y barbwr, mae Lewis eisiau gwybod 'Pam bod fy ngwallt yn tyfu?'. After a visit to the barber's, Lewis wants to know why his hair grows? Tadcu has an answer.

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae'r amgueddfa'n ddiflas yn l Joni, tan bod Beti Bowen yn ceisio dwyn DNA'r mamoth! The museum is boring according to Joni, until Beti Bowen comes to try to steal the DNA of the mammoth!

programme.title: Help Llaw
programme.desc: Harri gets a call to the Loggerheads park. He and Aled fix the bug hotel making sure the caterpillar has a safe home. Mae Harri'n cael galwad i barc Loggerheads i drwsio gwesty'r pryfed.

programme.title: Bwystfil
programme.desc: O gewri mawr i bryfed bach - mae gan yr anifeiliaid yma gryfder i wneud pethau rhyfeddol: cyfrwn lawr deg o'r cryfaf yn y byd. We count down 10 of the strongest animals in the world.

programme.desc: Rhaglen o ardal Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025 - Castell-nedd Port Talbot, yn cynnwys pecynnau amrywiol a sgyrsiau. Special edition from the Urdd National Eisteddfod 2025 area in Neath Port Talbot.

programme.desc: A fydd Y Gnoll yn ysbrydoliaeth dda i'r artist Meuryn Hughes wrth iddo wynebu'r her o beintio'r cyn-chwaraewr rygbi Jonathan Davies? This time, artist Meuryn Hughes paints Jonathan Davies.

programme.desc: Dewch ar antur i gwrdd ag anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac y tro hwn byddwn yn dod i nabod crwban y mor a gloyn y llaethlys. This time, we get to know the sea turtle and the milkweed butterfly.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wrth i Peredur Pysgotwr fynd i helynt mawr wrth gyfansoddi darn newydd o gerddoriaeth, daw Guto a'i ffrindiau i'w achub! Peredur Pysgotwr gets into trouble while composing a new piece.

programme.title: Amser Maith Maith yn l
programme.desc: Stori o adeg y Rhyfel Byd Cyntaf sydd gan Tadcu i Ceti heddiw. Mae Sam y Postmon yn galw ac mae Tomi'n hapus iawn. Today, Grandad has a story from The First World War.

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae Pablo wrth ei fodd yn gwrando ar gerddoriaeth. Pan mae'n clywed ei hoff gn ar y radio, mae o eisiau ei chlywed eto, ond all o ddim ffeindio'r gn yn unlle. Pablo searches for a song!

programme.title: New: Annibendod
programme.desc: Pan mae ymdrech Anni i ddod o hyd i sgil newydd yn tarddu ar beiriant compostio newydd Gari, mae iard yr ysgol yn troi'r annibendod llwyr! Anni's efforts to find a new skill causes chaos!

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae'r ffrindiau yn dathlu dydd Santes Dwynwen! On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are celebrating Saint Dwynwen's Day!

programme.title: Sigldigwt
programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd sawl cath fach a Delor a'i asynnod. Today we meet some cute kittens and Delor and her donkeys.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Mae'r fowlen golchi llestri yn llawn swigod ac mae Fflwff wrth ei fodd yn eu dynwared. Mae Seren yn hoffi swn y dwr yn arllwys i mewn i'r sinc. Ond beth mae'r Capten yn ei wneud yn y sinc?

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stwi'n penderfynu dilyn l troed ei arwr ar y teledu sy'n dditectif, ac yn ceisio datrys dirgelwch dannedd coll Mam-gu. Inspired by his favourite TV show Stiw plays at being a detective.

programme.title: Dathlu 'Da Dona
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Gertrude yn cael parti'r enfys gyda Twm Tisian. Today, Gertrude will be having a rainbow party with Twm Tisian.

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn direidus heddiw? What's happening in the mischievous pups' lives today?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Siwan yn gobeithio ar ei diwrnod mawr y bydd hi'n medru ymweld a seren Dwylo'r Enfys, Heulwen. Will Siwan be able to visit her favourite TV star and heroine, Dwylo'r Enfys' Heulwen?

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Cn hyfryd am ddau o blant bach yn mynd ar antur hudol ar gefn ceffyl wen. An enchanting song about two young children that go on an adventurous ride on the back of a magical white horse

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Mr a Mrs Twrch yn mynd ar eu gwyliau, ac mae Twm Twrch yn gwahodd Mishmosh draw i aros. Mr and Mrs Twrch are going on holiday for the weekend, and Twm Twrch invites Mishmosh to stay.

programme.title: Deian a Loli

programme.title: Pablo

programme.title: Annibendod

programme.title: Sigldigwt

programme.title: Blociau Lliw

programme.desc: Pa anifeiliaid fyddwn ni'n dysgu amdan heddiw, tybed? Which animals are we going to be meeting today?

programme.title: Joni Jet

programme.title: What A Crazy World
programme.desc: 1963. Musical. Directed by Michael Carreras. Stars Joe Brown, Susan Maughan, Harry H Corbett and Marty Wilde. An East End lad, Alf Hitchens, dreams of hitting the big time in the music business.

programme.title: Element of Doubt
programme.desc: 1996. Thriller. Directed by Christopher Morahan. Stars Nigel Havers, Gina McKee & Judy Parfitt. A woman has doubts about the loyalty of her husband and suspects him of playing a deceitful game. [S]

programme.title: Vintage Wine
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. The family head of a wine company refuses to retire, but his family have other ideas. Starring Seymour Hicks. [S]

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Bill Thompson Gives In. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Hal Baylor, Denver Pyle. Wyatt uses Native American scouts in his efforts to locate a killer, which doesn't sit well with some Ellsworth citizens. [S]

programme.title: The Six Men
programme.desc: 1951. Drama. Directed by Michael Law. A story tracing the activities of a gang of crooks whose long run of successful coups has the police in a panic. Starring Harold Warrender & Olga Edwardes. [S]

programme.title: The Gambler and the Lady
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Directed by Patrick Jenkins & Sam Newfield. Stars Dane Clark, Kathleen Byron & Naomi Chance. A gambler attempts to put his past behind him to impress a wealthy girl he has fallen for. [S]

programme.title: Battle Taxi
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Herbert L. Strock. Stars Sterling Hayden, Arthur Franz & Marshall Thompson. A hotshot jet pilot must learn how to be a team player after joining a helicopter rescue squad. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Key of the Door
programme.desc: 1963. An intriguing look at the men and women of tomorrow who are needed to extend technology.

programme.title: The Mark of Cain
programme.desc: 1947. Crime Drama. Directed by Brian Desmond Hurst. Stars Eric Portman, Sally Gray & Patrick Holt. A young French girl instigates rivalry between two brothers when she marries the younger one. [S]

programme.title: Spare the Rod
programme.desc: 1961. Drama. Director: Leslie Norman. Stars Max Bygraves, Geoffrey Keen, Donald Pleasence. A new teacher arrives at an East London school to find that his modern education methods are not welcome. [S]

programme.title: Lorna Doone
programme.desc: 1951. Adventure. Directed by Phil Karlson. Stars Barbara Hale, Richard Greene & Carl Benton Reid. A love affair between a farmer and an outlaw's daughter develops with bitter-sweet results. [S]

programme.title: The Marked One
programme.desc: 1963. Crime. Director: Francis Searle. Stars William Lucas, Zena Walker & Patrick Jordan. Criminals kidnap a man's daughter in order to obtain forgery plates which they believe he possesses. [S]

programme.title: The Edgar Wallace Mystery Theatre
programme.desc: The Set-Up. 1962. Directed by Gerard Glaister. Stars Maurice Denham, John Carson & Brian Peck. A benevolent act on a train leads to something more sinister for an ex-convict. [S]

programme.title: Man from Interpol
programme.desc: Killer with a Long Arm. 1960. Stars Richard Stapley & Peter Vaughan. A gunsmith is killed in his own shop and a rifle with a telescopic sight is stolen. Agent Smith is sent to find the murderer. [S]

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Clock King's Crazy Crimes. 1966. Stars Adam West & Walter Slezak. The Clock King arranges for one of his trick timepieces to be sold to the Harry Hummert Jewellery Shop so he can loot it. [S]

programme.title: Dial 999
programme.desc: Commando Crook. 1958. Stars Robert Beatty, Richard Bird & Arthur Goullet. Maguire investigates a series of robberies; however, his prime suspect is a crook everyone believes has gone straight. [S]

programme.title: The Halfway House
programme.desc: 1944. Drama. Directed by Basil Dearden. Starring Mervyn Johns, Glynis Johns & Tom Walls. A group of travellers, all with something to hide in their past, take shelter from a storm in an old inn. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline Munro invites you back into The Cellar Club for a night of chilling films. First up, is the 1983 college based slasher The House on Sorority Row starring Kate McNeill and Eileen Davidson. [S]

programme.title: The House on Sorority Row
programme.desc: 1983. Horror. Directed by Mark Rosman. Stars Kate McNeil, Eileen Davidson & Janis Ward. Seven sorority sisters become the targets of a ruthless killer after an innocent prank goes horribly wrong. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: Caroline continues the night by returning to slasher territory with the 1989 horror Offerings; produced, written and directed by Christopher Reynolds. [S]

programme.title: Offerings
programme.desc: 1989. Horror. Directed by Christopher Reynolds. Stars Loretta Leigh Bowman & Richard A. Buswell. A young man escapes from a mental institution to get revenge on the bullies who sent him there. [S]

programme.title: Hammer House of Mystery and Suspense

programme.title: The Killings At Outpost Zeta
programme.desc: 1980. Sci-Fi. A team investigates the mysterious deaths of two previous expeditioners to a strategically important part of a barren world. [S]

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies

programme.title: Stagecoach West
programme.desc: Red Sand. Western starring Richard Eyer, Robert Bray & Dean Jones. During a ferocious sandstorm, Simon Kane spots a man lying by the side of the road. [S]

programme.title: Storm in a Teacup
programme.desc: 1937. Romantic Comedy. Directors: Ian Dalrymple & Victor Saville. Stars Vivien Leigh, Rex Harrison & Cecil Parker. A local politician tries to end his daughter's romance with a crusading reporter. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Racing to the Start
programme.desc: 1967. An exciting look at individuals who have made racing cars, with an insight into the research and technical skill involved.

programme.title: Not as a Stranger

programme.title: Black Beauty
programme.desc: 1971. Drama. Director: James Hill. Stars Mark Lester, Walter Slezak & Peter Lee Lawrence. The story of a horse who is separated from a young boy and his life with different owners over the years. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers

programme.title: Run Wild, Run Free
programme.desc: 1969. Drama. Directed by Richard C. Sarafian. Stars John Mills, Sylvia Syms & Gordon Jackson. A psychosomatically mute young boy finds an emotional release through his love for a wild white colt. [S]

programme.title: The Flying Deuces
programme.desc: 1939. Comedy. Stan Laurel and Oliver Hardy join the foreign legion to get over Ollie's broken heart. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True

programme.title: Victorian Scandals

programme.title: Garden Rescue

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway

programme.title: Tool Club
programme.desc: 3/15. The team build planters for the residents' allotment, and Julia and Ben make a sensory board. At the Tool Bus, a precious lamp gets a new lease of life.

programme.title: Martin Compston's Scottish Fling

programme.title: My Floating Home
